scripts.--buildmain: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Main --module Example.Main | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/main.js
scripts.--buildworker: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Worker --module Example.Worker | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/worker.js
scripts.devmain: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Main --module Example.Main | browserify -e - -o static/main.js
scripts.devworker: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Worker --module Example.Worker | browserify -e - -o static/worker.js
